content: A British author, born in the 1960s, who wrote a famous series of fantasy novels. Her name is "Joanne" what?

Rowling, Joanne Rowling, better known by her pen name J.K. Rowling, is a British author born in 1965. She is renowned for writing the Harry Potter series, which consists of seven fantasy novels. The series has gained immense popularity worldwide and has been adapted into a highly successful film franchise. Apart from Harry Potter, Rowling has also written other works, including adult fiction and crime novels under the pseudonym Robert Galbraith. Her contributions to literature and storytelling have earned her numerous awards and accolades.
